mapper.select: select count(*) from REAL_BOOK where BOOK_NO = #{value} and REAL_BOOK_STATUS ='대여가능'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_RESERVATIONS (RESERVE_NO, RESERVE_DATE, BOOK_NO, USER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_BOOK_RESERVATIONS.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE,#{bookNo}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT br.*, u.NAME as name FROM BOOK_RESERVATIONS br JOIN USERS u ON br.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE br.BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
